WorkItem.Description:
Design time data does not load with .NET 4.6.1. After switching my projects to .NET 4.5.1 design data started working again.

Tried using Debug in VS with the Blend process and the debugger was not hitting any breakpoints. After changing projects to 4.5.1, debugger worked and I was able to hit breakpoints.
WorkItem.Summary: Design Data does not work with .NET 4.6.1

Comments.Message: Blend has changed the way that they load symbols. I will look at it. It is so annoying that they keep changing the debug model all the time...
